#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cctype>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cassert>
#include<algorithm>
#include<numeric>
#include<functional>
#include<iterator>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<list>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
      vector<int>v;
      scanf("%d",&m);
      
      
      for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
      {int p;
      cin>>p;
      v.push_back(p);
      }
      if(m%2==0)
      printf("-1\n");
      else
      {
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
    printf("%d\n",v[m/2]);}

}

return 0;
}
